title: CreateOrderFromShipments
description: This service creates an order for the referenced shipments that have previously been created using the Create Shipments service.

order_reference.description: A unique reference for the order, generated by the merchant

payment_method.description: The intended method of payment, the only valid value is: CHARGE_TO_ACCOUNT

consignor.description: The name or ID of the consignor for this order. If provided this information is included in the delivery documentation to assist traceability.

shipments.description: Shipment information must be supplied for each shipment to be included in the order.

shipment_id.description: Australia Postâ€™s unique reference for the shipment. This must reference a shipment previously created but not yet contained in an order.
